name: Telekinesis
description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. Each round, you can use your action to attempt to move a creature or object within range. Make an ability check with your spellcasting ability contested by the creatureâ€™s Strength check. If you win, you move the creature up to 30 feet in any direction. You can also move objects weighing up to 1,000 pounds.
